explanation: [0-0] The screen is divided into upper and lower parts. The upper part is blurred, while the lower part is clear. In the upper part, a man in a white jersey is walking along the edge of a stadium. In the background, several staff members are setting up or maintaining the field, and many spectators are seated in the stands in the distance. In the lower part, the man in the white jersey is the same person as in the upper part. He is smiling at the camera, revealing his white teeth, and behind him is a slightly blurred blue background. Between the upper and lower parts of the screen is a red rectangle with a white border. Inside the rectangle are two lines of white subtitles on a black background, with five yellow crying emojis below the subtitles.

[0-4] The upper part of the screen moves to the right as the player continues walking along the sidelines. A child wearing white clothes and with long black hair is standing with their back to the player at the edge of the field. The player stops, reaches out his left hand, and pats the child on the head. The child immediately turns around, waves their fist at the player, and sticks out their tongue. The player continues walking along the sidelines and waves to the spectators in the stands. The lower part of the screen remains static.
